players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "Stay alert and watch each other closely. We need to uncover the mafioso before they eliminate us all."
Bob: "Let's work together to uncover the mafioso. We need to be cautious and gather more information before making any accusations."
